meanings.definition: A unit of measurement equal to one-twelfth of a foot.
meanings.sent1: I measured the length of the table using uds.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter needed uds to cut the wood accurately.

meanings.sent4: Her precision was as exact as a uds in a carpenter's toolbox.
meanings.sent5: The concept of uds made the math lesson more understandable.

meanings.definition: A type of Spanish stew made with beans, sausage, and other ingredients.
